bibl.title: La Biblioteca d'Alexandria a l'obra d'Ateneu de Nàucratis.
bibl.note: In Athenaeus of Naucratis' work we find the philological task developed in Alexandrian Library, although reduced to the dimensions of a book where any kind of knowledge related to the symposium is casted. So, the reference to Alexandria is basic in this text, provided the strong affinity between the Library's great work and the ambitious project of the Deipnosophistai. - Avec résumés en catalan et en anglais.

bibl.title: "Artes ad humanitatem. [Actes del XVI Simposi de la Secció Catalana de la SEEC, Tarragona, 22-24 d'octubre de 2009.] I; - II."

bibl.seg: Laia Bofill Torres, La Biblioteca d'Alexandria a l'obra d'Ateneu de Nàucratis.

Esperança Borrell Vidal & Pilar Gómez Cardó (edd.), Artes ad humanitatem. [Actes del XVI Simposi de la Secció Catalana de la SEEC, Tarragona, 22-24 d'octubre de 2009.] I (Barcelona, 2010) pp. 105-113.

In Athenaeus of Naucratis' work we find the philological task developed in Alexandrian Library, although reduced to the dimensions of a book where any kind of knowledge related to the symposium is casted. So, the reference to Alexandria is basic in this text, provided the strong affinity between the Library's great work and the ambitious project of the Deipnosophistai. - Avec résumés en catalan et en anglais.
